source.batting: select TEAM_Id as S_Team ,BAT_ORDER as S_Bat_Order ,PLAYER_ID as S_Batter, WKT_TYPE as S_WicketType, FIELDER as S_FielderName, BOWLER as S_Bowler,RUNS as S_Runs, Minutes as S_Minutes,Fours as S_Fours,Six as S_Sixes,Strikerate as S_Strikerate,Balls as S_Balls,Innings as S_Innings, Match_Id as EX_Match_Id  from BCCI.clear.PFT_BCCI_BATTING
